name: Girls on the Mic
description: GOTM uses music and media to attract and connect underserved Bay Area girls and gender-expansive youth every year to free audio and music production and STEM/creative technology training, mentoring, and career/educational counseling The program provides students with tuition-free, hands-on, project-based training and access to musical instruments, technology, and young women/gender-expansive mentors.
